page.title: 20School cricket
page.content: Rendcomb College v Cheltenham Grammar School-Saturday June 8 1985 Rendcomb won the toss & asked CGS to bat a wet wicket.CGS struggled to 101 for 9 wickets declared in 2 hours 40 minutes against accurate bowling & a defensive field.The declaration left the home side 65 minutes to bat.Both sides went for a win & the Rendcombe number 10 was run out with the scores level so the result was a draw. CGS 101 for 9 declared: C.Furley 6, J.Herbert 7,B.Fenley 5,M,Hayes 29, J Parsons 18,D.Thomas 0,M.Hamer 21,W Francis 1,J.Luxton 1,A.Walker 3,A Hanks 0 no,Extras 10 M.Binder 2 for 19,N Webb 1 for 22,N Patterson-Fox 1 for 23,K Elderfield 2 for 23,A Brealy 2 for 11 Rendcomb College 101 for 9 So- The final scores were equal. Recreation at its best!
